title: Like A Girl
description: Do you ever get the feeling that girls have it less easy than boys? Have you been told to behave 'like a girlâ€™? That you should learn to cook and be nice and keep your legs crossed? Well, here are the stories of fifty-six women who broke the rules to forge new paths for themselves and others. Adventurous and ambitious, they fought battles and legal cases. They won elections and matches. They climbed mountains and mastered science. Best of all, they never stopped chasing their dreams. Read about them. Talk about them. Get inspired. And go change the world!
author: Aparna Jain
